txt.en:
'Hello! In appreciation of your donations to our cause, I offer items for barter. The more tokens you donate, the more of my items you can obtain!

'Bear in mind that my associate sells these same items for a cheaper price, but only if we meet our collective collection goals! Whether you buy my goods now or wait to see if you unlock the Bounder's Bounty is up to you.

'Either way, the more you donate, the more you will be able to purchase, it's a good deal for us all!'
